hero.heading: Build & Empower
hero.bio: I’m Islam Omar, a dedicated full-stack developer and passionate educator. I specialize in building scalable web applications using cutting-edge technologies. Whether it’s developing advanced platforms for event ticketing, election management, or entertainment streaming, I bring ideas to life with clean, efficient code. I’m also available to mentor aspiring developers, offering personalized lessons on programming fundamentals, OOP, algorithms, and data structures.
